caption.title: Digital surveillance of chikungunya in the Brazilian Brazil.
caption.p: Notified (orange) and confirmed (purple) cases in the central public health laboratories in Roraima state (a) and the Amazonas state (c) from January 2016 to January 2018. Dashed grey lines in (a) and (c) represent Google Trends activity for the term “chikungunya” in Roraima and Amazonas, respectively. Panels b and d show the correlation between Google Trends activity and cases notified in Roraima and Amazonas, respectively. Strength of the association was measured using the Spearman’s rank correlation coefficient (in panel b: p-value < 0.001; panel d: p-value = 5.183e-09).
